about_the_game:
NOODS is your companion app of choice for a successful work session, whether you’re planning a quick study break or a day grinding away at the computer. NOODS (Niche Operators Orchestrating Desktop Shenanigans) is a gamified focus tool that takes the form of an adorable and multi-functional desktop companion, allowing you to minimize distractions and tackle tasks with minimum disruption.

Niche Operators

Charming characters, designed with you in mind! The first official release features raccoon gamer girl Lily, hand-animated in a charming pixel style and hell bent on keeping you company as you go about your daily computer tasks. As multiple characters are released, you will be able to switch between Operators with the look, personality, and habits best suited for the task at hand. In later releases, we aim to make a tool to allow you to create your own Operator from scratch. Cool, right?

Stay Focused

Part idle clicker, part virtual buddy, this niche operator has many useful abilities; timers, schedules, window features, (and more to come!) so keep an eye out for upcoming releases. Designed to keep you focused and facilitate your real-life tasks, your Operator is just the right balance of subtle and functional to provide what you need; no more opening multiple pomodoro timers and schedule apps to stay on track; it’s all here. Simple n’ sweet.

A Little Spice

You won’t get away with slacking on your Operator’s watch: if left to her own devices, Lily has been known to get in a bit of trouble now and again. Keep your important windows out of her reach, and let her help you stay productive! Or else.
